Key:
(I'm going to go check in on Yoshino. I always
want to watch over her, and I'm worried.)
Yoshino, I've come to help.
Oh... Shido-san.
What are you making, Yoshino?
Um... stewed meat... and potatoes...

Oh, that sounds basic enough. Can I help you with
anything?

Oh... um... th-then... could you cut
the vegetables...

Okay, got it. Vegetables... You have Yoshinon with
you, so one of your hands is occupied, huh? Leave
it to me.
O-Okay... Thank you.
Hey, hey, Shido-kun. Can you not treat Yoshinon\nas someone in the way?

Oh, that's not what I meant. Oh... You seem to be
pretty useful in lifting up the hot lid of a pot.
You won't get burned.
What are you saying, Shido-kun?! Yoshinon feels\nthe heat too, you know!
Oh... uh... Sorry.
Just as long as you know! Anyways, I'll leave the\nrest to you.

Okay. And there are also beans, carrots... burdock
root. Do you want me to cut these up, too?
Y-Yes... Thank you.
"Hey, hey, Shido-kun. So what do you think? Are\nyou excited to try Yoshino's cooking? Huh? Huh?

Yeah, I'm looking forward to it. I'm glad to see
that there's at least one safe dish.
Yoshino sure can cook! She'll be a good wife.

Yeah. I mean, the choice of meat and potato stew
was promising enough.
W-Wife...
All right... I'm done, Yoshino.
Oh, okay. Um... Shido-san...
Hm? What is it?

Thank you... I... will do the rest... myself...
So please... just rest...

Yeah, it won't be good if I help too much, huh?
Okay, I'll be waiting over there.

(Yoshino seems to be okay.
I think this is enough.)
